Example.Name: SPI_LoopBack
Example.Description: Configure SPI0 as a master and SPI1 as a slave.Data width of a transaction: 32. The I/O connection for SPI0/SPI1 loopback: SPI0_SS (PE.4) <--> SPI1_SS(PC.12) SPI0_CLK(PE.5) <--> SPI1_CLK(PD.1) SPI0_MISO(PE.2) <--> SPI1_MISO(PD.0) SPI0_MOSI(PE.3) <--> SPI1_MOSI(PC.15)
